body:
TEMPORARY BAN

1

NOTICE:
  • Do not make any posts about your punishment
  • Click SUPPORT and go to the bottom section of the page
  • Do the instructions it says

WHEN I GET A REPLY

ACCEPTED:

You will be unbanned or you will have your punishment shortened
YOU WILL BE ON 0 TOLERANCE - You will not be able to re appeal, you may even be PERMANENTLY BANNED.

DENIED:

You will need to wait it out.
YOU WILL GET A REASON WHY YOU CANNOT BE UN BANNED



WHEN I DON'T GET A REPLY

Avicus services are busy. But a really long wait needs to be noticed

  • Make a private post, do not make public announcements...
  • Speak to the managers via Skype, In game or on Teamspeak (ts.avicus.net)

2

Wait it out...

PERMANENT BAN

1

NOTICE:
  • Do not make any posts about your punishment
  • Click SUPPORT and go to the bottom section of the page
  • Do the instructions it says.
WHEN I GET A REPLY

ACCEPTED:

You will be unbanned or you will have your punishment shortened
YOU WILL BE ON 0 TOLERANCE - You will not be able to re appeal, you may even be PERMANENTLY BANNED.

DENIED:

Permanently leave Avicus
YOU WILL GET A REASON WHY YOU CANNOT BE UN BANNED



WHEN I DON'T GET A REPLY

Avicus services are busy. But a really long wait needs to be noticed

  • Make a private post, do not make public announcements...
  • Speak to the managers via Skype, In game or on Teamspeak (ts.avicus.net)

2

Leave Avicus...

Tips and Warnings:


Give a valid reason why you should not be punished/appealed
Explain why you did or staff thought what you had did
Always give proof of your innocence.
Do you have witnesses?

Never lie. It just makes things worse if the staff find out.

Warning: Never log in with an alternative account if you are banned. You will be banned on both accounts and may be IP banned!

replies.body:
Funky Wunky's Guide to being thirsty, in 6 easy steps.
Step #1:Don't drink any liquid
Step #2:Still don't drink any liquid
Step #3:Make sure your body fluids are being drained
Step #4:Continue this for 4 days.
Step #5:Die of dehydration.
Step $6:Congratulations, you finally have experience true thirst.
